page.title: 10Games Children Play
page.content: Game {PLEASE MR CROCODILE} Small children play this game in the playground.One person is chosen to be Mr Crocodile and the others stand in front of him they ask the crocodile if they can cross his river this is what they shout,please Mr Crocodile may we cross the water to see the kings daughter what's the colour next? Then the crocodile names a colour and if the children are wearing that colour they have to run across past where the crocodile is standing and back without getting hit by the crocodile.The older children often play a game called {VICTORY.}In this game you have two lines either side of the playground.Behind these lines is safe from the person who is hit.The others run from line to line trying not to get hit if they do get hit they are hit with the other child who is hit.
